import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import {Product, products} from '../products'; @Component({ selector: 'app-product-list', templateUrl: './product-list.component.html', styleUrls: ['./product-list.component.css'] }) export class ProductListComponent { products = products; getProductListByCategory(category: string) { return this.products.filter((x) => x.category == category); } } /* Copyright Google LLC. All Rights Reserved. Use of this source code is governed by an MIT-style license that can be found in the LICENSE file at https://angular.io/license */

{{ product.name }}

Price: {{ product.price }}
